/dbox/Dropbox.description: Share for Dropbox data must be (1000:1000).
/dbox/Dropbox.label: Dropbox data [e.g. dropbox-data]

/dbox/.dropbox.description: Share for Dropbox Configuration must be (1000:1000).
/dbox/.dropbox.label: Dropbox config [e.g. dropbox-config]

DBOX_UID.description: Enter a valid UID to run dropbox as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
DBOX_UID.label: UID to run dropbox as.

DBOX_GID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
DBOX_GID.label: GID to run dropbox as.

$DBOX_SKIP_UPDATE.description: Set this to 'True' to skip updating to the latest Dropbox version on contrainer start. 'True' or 'False' (case sensitive).
$DBOX_SKIP_UPDATE.label: Skip updating dropbox? [e.g. False]

Dropbox.description:
Dropbox containerised. Runs as UID:GID (1000:1000): ensure mapped Shares are compatible.

Note: uses `net=host` for core functionality.

After installed: see `/var/log/messages` for a line with 'Please visit url-here` to link this instance.'

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 architecture only.
